title: "Generalizable deep temporal models for predicting episodes of sudden hypotension in critically ill patients: a personalized approach"
excerpt: "The temporal nature and fine granularity of much of the data collected in the ICU enable the pursuit of predictive modeling. In particular, forecasting acute hypotensive episodes (AHE) in intensive care patients has been of interest to researchers in critical care medicine."
